title: [Neuroscience] Over half of brains donated to the Australian Sports Brain Bank have signs of chronic traumatic encephalopathy (CTE), a degenerative brain disease associated with repeated blows to the head, researchers have found

[Medicine] A new study has identified 228 clinical practices in Canada that are used inappropriately (diagnostic and therapeutic), with underuse being more common than overuse. Evaluating more than 28.9 million patients between 2007 and 2021, the researchers found inappropriate care in 30% of cases.
